name: Quota Qrunch
description:
*** Press ESC or TAB to  adjust sensitivity ***

Do you have what it takes to keep up with demand...?

Grab. Package. Deposit. Three words that every employee here lives by. You've taken this new job thinking you are up to the task, but are you sufficiently dedicated to the company?  Remember, a good worker always meets their quota... no matter the cost.

Credits

Break Room Music: [Loading Screen Loop by Brandon Morris](https://opengameart.org/content/loading-screen-loop)

Warehouse Music: [Soul Star by FoxSynergy](https://opengameart.org/content/soul-star)

Dark Break Room/Warehouse Music: [Factory Ambiance by yd](https://opengameart.org/content/factory-ambiance)

A project from Bowl Monkey Labs for the Ludum Dare 50 Game Jam.

Created by Dan Colom, Gabriel Hardwick, and Max Lepkowski.
